title: Software Development Intern
bullets: Engineered a Dockerized recommendation engine for HR background‐check services, leveraging a MySQL database, Python-powered machine learning models, a Sprawl-based React SPA, and seamless PHP MVC integration to accelerate applicant vetting and improve screening accuracy.

Delivered a full-stack web application powering Codeathon’s weekly quiz challenges, combining a C#/.NET MANTLE MVC backend with a React SPA frontend, implementing role-based access control via Active Directory authentication, and integrating machine-learning modules for plagiarism detection and automated clue generation.

title: Software Engineer 2
bullets: Implemented REST APIs to retrieve Airflow ML model pipelines status, model instance user edit trail information, and model outcome insights for Epsilon's Customer Data Platform (CDP) UI.

Built an automated functional testing framework to test various ML workflows, data/model pipelines, and components in Databricks, Postgres, and Airflow, reducing manual testing efforts by 20 hours per sprint.

Created parameterized Terraform modules and pipeline templates on GoCD using Bash scripts to automate provisioning of cloud resources on AWS and Databricks for access management, compute configuration, and storage.

title: Software Engineer 1
bullets: Developed a Java library to expose ML model scores with A/B testing capabilities, integrating AWS resources and APIs with robust error handling, logging, continuous deployment, code coverage, and vulnerability monitoring.
Implemented a multi-purpose data-mapping transformer using PySpark to standardize data from multiple heterogeneous sources into consistent objects consumable by ML pipelines.
Automated the creation of Athena tables and model score processes, improving data processing efficiency and enabling seamless integration with Tableau for customer segmentation visualizations.

title: Intern - Data Science
bullets: Collaborated with data scientists and engineers to build Redash dashboards using AWS SageMaker for flight booking data analysis.
Analyzed clickstream data to improve feature selection for dynamic discounting models, enhancing personalization for customers.

title: Intern - AI/Data Engineering
bullets: Curated large-scale fashion image datasets via Selenium web scraping.
Trained fine-grained classification models using transfer learning with ILSVRC CNN architectures to categorize products based on user preferences.

title: AI/ML Intern Trainee - Project Team Lead
bullets: Built a convolutional neural network (CNN) with OpenCV and scikit-learn preprocessing to achieve 90% accuracy on the Caltech-100 dataset.
Developed a Flask web app with Bootstrap to visualize real-time image classification results.
